rules.title: Game Rules
rules.html:
Story

Pepe must rescue his fiancée from a jealous farmer. The farm is guarded by angry chickens, mini-chickens and a furious endboss. Collect resources, dodge attacks and fight your way to the hut gate!

Controls

  • ←/→ Move
  • ↑ Jump
  • D Throw bottle
  • F Supernova (if available)
  • Pause via the top UI bar

Items

  • Bottles: Ranged damage vs. enemies & boss
  • Hearts: Restore health
  • Coins: Score & unlock effects
  • Whiskey: Energy / power-up

Tips

  • Jump on small enemies to defeat them.
  • Use bottles from a safe distance.
  • Watch your health bar and heal in time.
  • The endboss reacts on sight – keep moving.

Goal

Reach the farm gate, defeat the endboss and free Pepe’s fiancée. ¡Buena suerte!
